import React from 'react' import "./searchProfile.css" import EditAlertSetting from './EditAlertSetting' function AlertSetting({user,handleEditClick}) { return (
Profile Page

Name: {user.name}

Email: {user.email}

Phone: {user.phone_number}

Twitter: {user.x}

Facebook: {user.facebook}

LinkedIn: {user.linkedin}

User Roles: {user.user_roles}

{isEditing && }
) } export default AlertSetting
